GrandChallenges.name: Develop sustainable fusion energy
GrandChallenges.description: Achieve practical and economical nuclear fusion as a clean energy source.

GrandChallenges.name: Enhance energy storage
GrandChallenges.description: Create efficient, long-duration energy storage systems to support renewable energy.

GrandChallenges.name: Improve solar energy conversion
GrandChallenges.description: Increase the efficiency and affordability of photovoltaic cells.

GrandChallenges.name: Develop carbon capture and storage (CCS)
GrandChallenges.description: Implement scalable CCS technologies to reduce greenhouse gas emissions.

GrandChallenges.name: Create a smart grid
GrandChallenges.description: Modernize the electricity grid for better efficiency and reliability.

GrandChallenges.name: Address climate change
GrandChallenges.description: Develop strategies to mitigate and adapt to climate change impacts.

GrandChallenges.name: Ensure clean water availability
GrandChallenges.description: Innovate in water purification and desalination technologies.

GrandChallenges.name: Restore and protect ecosystems
GrandChallenges.description: Implement methods to restore degraded ecosystems and protect biodiversity.

GrandChallenges.name: Reduce plastic pollution
GrandChallenges.description: Develop biodegradable alternatives and improve recycling technologies.

GrandChallenges.name: Combat air pollution
GrandChallenges.description: Create technologies to reduce emissions from industrial and transportation sources.

GrandChallenges.name: Cure cancer
GrandChallenges.description: Find universal or highly targeted cures for various types of cancer.

GrandChallenges.name: Address antibiotic resistance
GrandChallenges.description: Develop new antibiotics and alternative treatments to combat resistant bacteria.

GrandChallenges.name: Prevent and treat neurodegenerative diseases
GrandChallenges.description: Create effective therapies for Alzheimer's, Parkinson's, and other neurodegenerative disorders.

GrandChallenges.name: Improve mental health treatment
GrandChallenges.description: Innovate in diagnosis and treatment of mental health disorders.

GrandChallenges.name: Develop personalized medicine
GrandChallenges.description: Tailor medical treatments based on individual genetic profiles.

GrandChallenges.name: Advance gene editing
GrandChallenges.description: Improve CRISPR and other gene-editing technologies for safe and precise medical applications.

GrandChallenges.name: Synthetic biology
GrandChallenges.description: Engineer microorganisms for sustainable production of fuels, chemicals, and pharmaceuticals.

GrandChallenges.name: Regenerate tissues and organs
GrandChallenges.description: Develop techniques for growing organs and tissues for transplantation.

GrandChallenges.name: Understand the human microbiome
GrandChallenges.description: Explore how the microbiome influences health and disease.

GrandChallenges.name: Combat genetic diseases
GrandChallenges.description: Find cures for hereditary diseases through genetic therapy and intervention.

GrandChallenges.name: Achieve general AI
GrandChallenges.description: Develop artificial intelligence that can perform any intellectual task that a human can.

GrandChallenges.name: Ensure AI ethics and safety
GrandChallenges.description: Create frameworks to ensure ethical use and safety of AI technologies.

GrandChallenges.name: Improve quantum computing
GrandChallenges.description: Develop practical and scalable quantum computers.

GrandChallenges.name: Cybersecurity
GrandChallenges.description: Create unbreakable encryption and secure communication systems.

GrandChallenges.name: Develop brain-computer interfaces
GrandChallenges.description: Enhance direct communication between brains and computers for medical and non-medical applications.

GrandChallenges.name: Enable human Mars exploration
GrandChallenges.description: Overcome the technical and physiological challenges of manned missions to Mars.

GrandChallenges.name: Search for extraterrestrial life
GrandChallenges.description: Develop methods to detect and study life beyond Earth.

GrandChallenges.name: Develop space habitats
GrandChallenges.description: Create sustainable living environments for long-term space habitation.

GrandChallenges.name: Protect Earth from asteroids
GrandChallenges.description: Implement systems to detect and deflect potentially hazardous asteroids.

GrandChallenges.name: Improve space propulsion
GrandChallenges.description: Innovate propulsion systems for faster and more efficient space travel.

GrandChallenges.name: Develop advanced materials
GrandChallenges.description: Create new materials with exceptional properties for various applications.

GrandChallenges.name: Nano-engineering
GrandChallenges.description: Manipulate materials at the nanoscale for enhanced performance and new functionalities.

GrandChallenges.name: Self-healing materials
GrandChallenges.description: Develop materials that can repair themselves after damage.

GrandChallenges.name: Lightweight and strong materials
GrandChallenges.description: Innovate materials that are both lightweight and strong for use in transportation and construction.

GrandChallenges.name: Sustainable materials
GrandChallenges.description: Create materials with minimal environmental impact and high recyclability.

GrandChallenges.name: Resilient infrastructure
GrandChallenges.description: Design infrastructure that can withstand natural disasters and climate change.

GrandChallenges.name: Smart cities
GrandChallenges.description: Develop cities that utilize technology for efficient management of resources and services.

GrandChallenges.name: Affordable housing
GrandChallenges.description: Innovate in construction methods and materials to provide affordable housing solutions.

GrandChallenges.name: Efficient transportation systems
GrandChallenges.description: Create sustainable and efficient public and private transportation systems.

GrandChallenges.name: Waste management
GrandChallenges.description: Improve methods for waste reduction, recycling, and disposal.

GrandChallenges.name: Global literacy and education
GrandChallenges.description: Ensure access to quality education for all children worldwide.

GrandChallenges.name: Lifelong learning
GrandChallenges.description: Develop systems that support continuous education and skills development throughout life.

GrandChallenges.name: AI in education
GrandChallenges.description: Utilize AI to personalize and enhance learning experiences.

GrandChallenges.name: Eradicate poverty
GrandChallenges.description: Innovate economic and social solutions to lift people out of poverty globally.

GrandChallenges.name: Global health equity
GrandChallenges.description: Ensure access to healthcare and essential medicines for all populations.

GrandChallenges.name: Sustainable economic growth
GrandChallenges.description: Create models for economic growth that do not compromise environmental sustainability.

GrandChallenges.name: Improve disaster response
GrandChallenges.description: Develop better methods for predicting, responding to, and recovering from natural disasters.

GrandChallenges.name: Ethical governance of technology
GrandChallenges.description: Establish policies and regulations to manage the ethical implications of emerging technologies.

GrandChallenges.name: Food security
GrandChallenges.description: Innovate agricultural practices to ensure food security for the growing global population.

GrandChallenges.name: Global health systems
GrandChallenges.description: Strengthen global health systems to better handle pandemics and health crises.
